actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deduction from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $4,800 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance Program of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deduction from benefits thereunder.
